trans-unit.target: Azure API Management REST API API entity

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to manage APIs and their operations using the <token>azure_apimgt_3</token> REST API.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to manage APIs and their operations using the <token>azure_apimgt_3</token> REST API.

trans-unit.source: <token>crabout</token> working with APIs and operations in the <token>azportal</token>, see <externalLink><linkText>How to create APIs, operations, and products in Azure API Management</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=510414</linkUri></externalLink>.
